definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
(to express one's) true feelings/what is on one's mind/secret mind
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
to take sth to heart/to take sth seriously
to have a plan in mind
to have secret motives/to have a guilty conscience
lit. itchy heart/to be itching to do sth (idiom)
Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable
to keep in mind/to store in one's heart/to remember perfectly

sentences.english: It did my heart good to hear about your promotion to Vice President of the agency.
sentences.chinese: 得知你提升为经销处副总经理，我心里特别高兴。

sentences.english: Please lay the maxim to your heart.
Why always cover tightly frowzily in the heart?
sentences.chinese: 为什么心里总是闷闷的？

sentences.english: Or for love in the heart can not calm the Brief Encounter and settle old scores?
sentences.chinese: 还是为爱在心里不能坦然的相见恨晚而心有不甘？

sentences.english: I refused my heart no pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 凡我心里所念的，我都会让自己享受。

sentences.english: She was surprised by a wanton thought that rushed into her mind.
sentences.chinese: 一个放肆的念头在她心里闪过，叫她吃了一惊。

sentences.english: She was pleased with his flatteries.
sentences.chinese: 听了他的奉承话，她心里很乐。

sentences.english: The original inquiry from abroad, information, and my heart is relatively happy.
sentences.chinese: 原来是来自国外询盘信息，心里也比较高兴。

sentences.english: People believe that good is rewarded with good.
sentences.chinese: 因为在老百姓心里，好人必有好报。

sentences.english: You are in my thoughts every minute of the day!
sentences.chinese: 白天，你每分每秒在我心里。

sentences.english: Have nothing in your heart, for you will also become topsy-turvy.
sentences.chinese: 没有在你的心里，你也将成为颠倒。

sentences.english: The thought fluttered in her mind like a flame-attracted moth .
sentences.chinese: 这想法有如被火光吸引的飞蛾在她心里扑腾着。

sentences.english: The sword falls, eastern brocade in the mind immediately a cold.
sentences.chinese: 剑落，东方锦心里顿时一寒。

sentences.english: Though working outside, he is always concerned about his aging mother at home.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然在外工作，心里却一直萦系家中的老母。

sentences.english: Ling is a reluctant to see red fruits jie who, in the heart very length is not happy.
sentences.chinese: 凌桀看到红果一启齿就长短凡，心里很不快乐。

sentences.english: It helps you not be inside so much.
sentences.chinese: 它能帮你不在心里憋太多事情。
